page.title: 08SOCIAL CONCERNS.
page.content: The social concerns of many of the{Box}residents were voiced in a booklet published in the mid 1970's called{Box Parish:An Appraisal.}This was organised by the{Parish Council and 600 questionaires were sent out,the majority of the residents whilst having some complaints on the lack of shopping facilities,felt that the character of the village should be maintained , and that it should not grow into a small town.Some concern was felt , and still is, about the amount of traffic that passes through {Box ,}making it difficult to get from one side of the village to the other.Unfortunatley most decisions on local matters are taken at{County {Hall,}many miles away.
